column4: Hi there, I'm having some issue with 7.10. There is a DHCP server on my network. eth0 appears in ifconfig, but it has no IP. However, theres ethO:ava which has a 196.254.*.* address (apipa and/or bonjour) ... How can I get eth0 to receive a valid IP address ?
I've added auto eth0 device eth0 inet dhcp
